content.text:
[@dan hassan](@NeB4q4Hy9IiMxs5L08oevEhivxW+/aDu/s/0SkNayi0=.ed25519)

I *think* I meant your #studioghifly gifs, but I didn't realize that [@moid](@Sur8RwcDh6kBjub8pLZpHNWDfuuRpYVyCHrVo+TdA/4=.ed25519) posted similar gifs -- either way, I really enjoyed it.
 
[@nealeratzlaff](@J233HHh6iMA7LxT+KnCbtI3GeaCJ7gW7dkB/63ObSJY=.ed25519) 

I can only remember seeing *Princess Mononoke* and *Spirited Away*, but *Howl's Moving Castle* and *My Neighbor Totoro* both look awfully familiar. Maybe I've seen four?
